entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain mixed with snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
